full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@001B NA MO GU RU: SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS LHO NUB SRIN PO YUL DU GSHEGS PA'I DUS SU: GUNG THANG LA THOG TU LHA SRAS MU KHRI BTZAN POS PHYAG DANG BSKOR BA BYAS: ZHABS LA SPYI BOS GTUGS:]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES 'DI LAS SMON GYIS BSKRUN 'DI NANG GNYEN, ,DAM PA'I MGON GYIS RJES BZUNG RDO RJE'I SPUN, ,DBANG CHOS DU MAS BSKYANGS PA'I DAM LDAN BU, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN MTSAN 'CHANG BA'I, ,PAndI TA YIS BSKUL BA'I GZHAN DBANG GIS, ,DON LA RMONGS SHING TSIG SBYOR MI MKHAS KYANG, ,RLUNG GIS BSKYOD PA'I 'DAB MA BYAR 'GRAN BZHIN, ,DUM BUR BCAD PA'I TSIG PHRENG SPEL BA PO, ,DAM PA'I MING 'CHANG GIS BSKRUN DGE BA YANG, ,BDAG GZHAN KUN MKHYEN THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,YI GE'I 'DU BYED BLO LDAN RIG GNAS PA, ,KUN DGA' 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS BSKRUN DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
